sentences.en: But the truly frightening thing was the emaciation of his body.
sentences.cn: 但是最吓人的还是身体羸弱的程度.

sentences.en: But what was startling was the emaciation of his face. It was like a skull.
sentences.cn: 但是教人吃惊的是他面孔的消瘦, 完全像个骷髅.

sentences.en: Fatigue, flushed cheeks, night sweats and progressive emaciation.
sentences.cn: 症状﹕疲倦﹐潮热矔红 ﹐ 盗汗﹐渐渐消瘦.

sentences.en: He was reduced almost to emaciation.
His face was hollowed out to the point of emaciation.
sentences.cn: 他的脸瘦削到了憔悴的地步.

sentences.en: Physical examination showed the patients had polyneuropathy, positive hypotension and emaciation.
sentences.cn: 体格检查提示为严重的感觉运动神经病 、 体位性低血压和消瘦.

sentences.en: The typical symptoms of DM are polydypsia, polyphagia, polyuria , emaciation and urinary glucose caused by hyperglycaemia.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病典型症状是高血糖而尿糖, 多饮、多食 、 多尿、消瘦.

sentences.en: These photographs show extremes of obesity and emaciation.
sentences.cn: 这些照片展现了肥胖与消瘦两个极端.
